name: cbvcsbv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))

stmt.origin: a1ii(wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2)), diffss(s0, s1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| wnfc(s1, c1)
-| wnfc(s0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wnfc(s1, c1)
-| wnfc(s0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))

|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wnfc(s0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Change the bound variable of a proper substitution into a class using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
